extension.name: Powered By Kunena Links Remover
extension.author: M007-file - www.kopl.pro
extension.description: Remove Powered By Kunena Links by M007-file (from kopl.pro) is a must-have Joomla plugin that cleans your Kunena forum by removing unnecessary "Powered By" links. This prevents spammy backlinks, improves your site's SEO by eliminating low-quality outbound links, and enhances user experience with a cleaner interface. Avoid unwanted redirects and maintain a professional look while boosting your site’s credibility. Lightweight, easy to install, and fully compliant with Joomla standards. Perfect for admins who want full control over their forum’s branding!
